website_summaries.verdict: From a company that only started out in 2003 manufacturing sailing shoes, it can be surprising how much Keen knows its way around lifestyle sneakers. Lorelai shoes are so incredibly comfy that your feet should be thanking you with every step you take.The shoes are stylish in a minimalist way, and the different hues these come in all look positively pleasing. The shoes are not supportive of the arches but are roomy enough to accommodate your custom orthotics should you want to wear them.
pros: Many users agree that Keen Lorelai sneakers are very comfortable, while one of them said that the shoes “put a spring in every step.”
These are “really cute” shoes according to several purchasers
A good number of KEEN Lorelai reviews had people marveling at the adorable colors of the sneakers
One person was happy about these kicks from Keen’s casual sneakers collection contained removable insoles
The shoes are roomy enough to accommodate orthotics, some stated
cons: Several purchasers reported that Keen Lorelai sneakers don’t provide support for the arches
The shoes feel flimsy and not suited for much walking, a few testers noted

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected from Keen
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute shoe, but does not deserve to be labeled Keen. I love Keens and they have always been the best shoes. These are so thin on the sole that you can feel everything you step on. I put cushioned inserts in them and it helped, but these are not meant to walk much in. I thought about returning them, but they are a cute shoe. So I kept them to wear on short outings to dinner and such.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Keisler

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected....
customer_reviews.text: Wrong size was sent. Now I have to go thru trouble of returning. Also original box must have been damaged because it was sent in an amazon box. Otherwise, shoe is narrow like keds or converse. It has no arch support. None. I like the style and will change the insole once or if get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Marti mcvaugh

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable casual
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are lightweight compared to other Keen shoes, like the Kaci II, which is more of a hiking boot. These are made of a more flexible material and have a thinner sole and less arch support so I may add a 3rd party insole. Very sleek for a comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Hays

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are amazing. Fit as expected. Very comfortable. I wear them daily.
customer_reviews.author: A point of view from Char

customer_reviews.title: Love Keen
customer_reviews.text: Love Keen footwear! Great fit and looks great with leggings!
customer_reviews.author: salespro

customer_reviews.title: You can actually put the LEFT shoe on your RIGHT foot!  No shape or support!!
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd review because I bought two of these poor quality Keen shoes. These are a great disappointment. You can actually put the left shoe on your right foot. I never had this happen before!!!
customer_reviews.author: lovedogs

customer_reviews.title: Not a Keen comfort shoe...
customer_reviews.text: This are cute but not that comfortable. Not like Keens I've bought in the past. Pretty flat, not really any support. I will keep these but they're definitely not my favorite... Would Not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A. Lidston

customer_reviews.title: Soles are NOT white
customer_reviews.text: The soles are a medium gray, not white like in the picture. On the toe of my left shoe is an obvious brown line on the gray rubber part. Not enough to bother returning, but I really wish the soles were white! I have these shoes in brown too...they are super comfortable and cute :)
customer_reviews.author: Mom n Sons

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe, could have a bit more arch support but they are comfy and my feet don't get tired in them.
customer_reviews.author: YvLoo

customer_reviews.title: They're a keeper
customer_reviews.text: Sits a little low at the heel, but keeping them because the style is so cute and I like the wide width.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Keitel

customer_reviews.title: Fun Keen Sneaker !!
customer_reviews.text: Another fun Keen Sneaker .. PURPLE !! True accurate fit ..
customer_reviews.author: JeanAnne Perrier

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fit, comfortable, and my feet look adorable. I love all my Keen’s but these are my new favorites!
customer_reviews.author: Cherokee

customer_reviews.title: No arch support!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe looks nice and seems well made. I returned mine because they have no arch support. I was very disappointed in a Keen product that costs this much.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: I can’t really provide a fair assessment. I was sent shoes that were one and a half sizes too small. Although I will say, that that after reading other opinions on these shoes, they did seem to have very little arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the sneakers. Looking forward to another pair... but which color? 🤔
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Look great with jeans. Very comfortable. I am going to order them in black too.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl Kendregan

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are good quality I wanted them to work, but the left shoe just wasn’t the right length for me to keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Cute but it has NONE of the usual Keen foot support. I was so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: alice p litteken

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable yet stylish
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable- not as much arch support as other KEENS. These are more like low profile trail shoes.
customer_reviews.author: allyson l. wills

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: More ache support would have made them perfect, but I love them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Doria

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute to wear, not a lot of arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Erin V.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, stylish, and have a removable insole
customer_reviews.text: I love these! The removable insole allowed me to remove and insert an orthotic for support:-)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Windsor

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Perfect fit and comfy! They are wearing well!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Comfortable and look good. Glad I have them
customer_reviews.author: Randee Hill

product_meta.title: KEEN Womens Lorelai Sneaker
product_meta.description: The premium style and lightweight feel of the KEEN® Lorelai Sneaker will keep you moving easily all day long. Premium leather upper. Traditional lace-up design with aluminum eyelets for a secure fit. Direct-attach construction to minimize glue use. Unlined interior. Luftcell PU footbed for underfoot comfort and support. Lightweight yet durable Luftcell outsole for weightless comfort and reliable traction. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 9 oz Product measurements were taken using size 9, width B - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: The premium style and lightweight feel of the KEEN® Lorelai Sneaker will keep you moving easily all day long.
Upper is made of environmentally preferred premium leather from an LWG-certified tannery.
Traditional lace-up design with aluminum eyelets for a secure fit.
International products have separate terms, are sold from abroad and may differ from local products, including fit, age ratings, and language of product, labeling or instructions.
